title: Lawson Craddock Tour de France diary: ‘Col de la Loze is the hardest climb I’ve ever raced’
content:
In his latest diary, Lawson talks about the Col de la Loze, pulling all day to bring back a breakaway, and what lies in store for Friday's firecracker stage.

Read the full article at Lawson Craddock Tour de France diary: ‘Col de la Loze is the hardest climb I’ve ever raced’ on Velo.
